...there are definitely these relationships in your life that...
...or in my life that have stuck with me forever and ever,...
...and I'm sure will be with me until the day I die.
And every now and then, I'll make a new friend and I'll think, you know,...
"...do I really have what it takes to take you on board as a new friend?"...
And, you know, particularly at my age, "Are you worth taking on board?"
And you know, you gotta take a chance on people...
...because they're taking a chance on you.
